  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_89614</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_89614</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Les choses dont on a besoin pour faire et maintenir  un tas de compost</string>
            <string language="en">Things needed in making and maintaining a compost heap</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sachen benötigten, wenn sie einen Mischunghaufen 
bildeten und beibehielten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As coisas necessitaram em fazer e em manter um 
heap do compost</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le cose hanno avuto bisogno di nel fare e 
nell'effettuare un mucchio della composta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πράγματα που απαιτούνται στην παραγωγή και τη 
διατήρηση ενός σωρού λιπάσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las cosas necesitaron en la fabricación y 
mantener de un montón del estiércol vegetal</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">La troisième sur trois illustrations montrant les choses dont on a besoin en faisant et en maintenant un tas  de compost. C'est un robinet avec des gouttelettes d'eau  s'égouttant de lui.</string>
            <string language="en">Third of three illustrations showing the things needed in making and maintaining a compost heap. This is a tap with water droplets dripping from it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">tas de compost</string>
            <string language="en">compost heap</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">gouttelettes</string>
            <string language="en">droplets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">prise</string>
            <string language="en">tap</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">choses</string>
            <string language="en">things</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">eau</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Abbildungen, welche die Sachen 
zeigen, benötigte, wenn es einen Mischunghaufen bildete und 
beibehielt. Dieses ist ein Hahn mit den Wassertröpfchen, die 
von ihm tropfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O third de três ilustrações que mostram as 
coisas necessitou em fazer e em manter um heap do compost. Esta 
é uma torneira com as gotas da água que gotejam dele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano le cose
ha avuto bisogno di nel fare e nell'effettuare un mucchio della 
composta. Ciò è un colpetto con le goccioline dell'acqua che 
gocciolano da esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τα πράγματα 
που απαιτούνται στην παραγωγή και τη διατήρηση ενός σωρού 
λιπάσματος. Αυτό είναι μια βρύση με τα σταγονίδια ύδατος 
που στάζουν από το.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El tercero de tres ilustraciones que mostraban las
cosas necesitó en la fabricación y mantener de un montón del 
estiércol vegetal. Esto es un golpecito con las gotitas del 
agua que gotean de él.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mischunghaufen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tröpfchen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hahn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sachen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">heap do compost</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gotas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">torneira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">coisas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mucchio della composta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">goccioline</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colpetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σταγονίδια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βρύση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πράγματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">montón del estiércol vegetal</string>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
